channel.title: Usage on Reacli
channel.description: Recent content in Usage on Reacli

item.title: Usage
item.description: If Reacli is installed globally If you have installed Reacli globally (see installation), you can directly use Reacli like: reacli component path/to/my/component If you did not install Reacli You don’t need to have Reacli installed globally to use it. You can use npx to run it wherever you want: npx reacli component path/to/my/component
